comments.content: **[Life Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724023506/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Life%20LT%20Roman%20-%20Bold&fid=3df52e826201d689796f6f21e51b3e94&fsize=60&text=Marion%20spectacle%20a%20la%20suite&wrap=2)** by Francesco Simoncini (1965) available by URW++, Linotype, Adobe, Bitstream (the Bitstream version is probably closer to your sample)
